item.title: 苹果折叠屏 iPhone 或命名「Ultra」，售价突破 1.7 万元
item.guid: 苹果折叠屏-iPhone-或命名「Ultra」，售价突破-1.7-万元
item.description:
According to 9to5Mac, Apple's first foldable iPhone is expected to launch next year, positioned as a high-end model. 据 9to5Mac 报道，苹果首款折叠屏 iPhone 预计明年推出，市场定位为高端机型。

Analysis firm Fubon Research points out that the model's price could be as high as $2399 (approximately 17,000 RMB), significantly higher than the previously rumored price of about $2000 (approximately 14,000 RMB). This price is almost double that of the current iPhone 17 Pro Max. 分析机构 Fubon Research 指出，该机型售价或高达 2399 美元（约合 17000 元人民币），远高于此前传闻的约 2000 美元（约 14000 元）。这一价格几乎是当前 iPhone 17 Pro Max 的两倍。

Sources say Apple may name the model "iPhone Ultra" instead of "iPhone Fold." This naming strategy aligns with its pricing logic, emphasizing an ultra-high-end positioning. 消息称，苹果可能将该机型命名为「iPhone Ultra」，而非「iPhone Fold」。这一命名策略与其定价逻辑相呼应，强调超高端定位。

In comparison, the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 starts at 13,999 RMB, and the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold is priced at $1799 (approximately 12,700 RMB), both lower than Apple's estimated price. 相比之下，三星 Galaxy Z Fold7 定价为 13999 元起，Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold 定价为 1799 美元（约 12700 元），均低于苹果的预计售价。

Industry insiders believe that foldable smartphones have gradually entered the mainstream market. Drew Blackard, Senior Vice President of Samsung Mobile America, stated that after multiple generations of iteration, foldable products can now offer a unique experience. Apple's decision to enter the market at this time indicates its judgment on technological maturity and market acceptance. 业内人士认为，折叠屏智能手机已逐渐进入主流市场。三星移动美国高级副总裁 Drew Blackard 表示，经过多代迭代，折叠屏产品已能提供独特体验。苹果选择此时入局，显示其对技术成熟度和市场接受度的判断。

Currently, external attention is focused on pricing and naming. If Apple ultimately adopts the 'Ultra' moniker and maintains a high-price strategy, its foldable iPhone will become one of the most expensive mainstream foldable models on the market. 目前，外界关注的焦点集中在定价与命名。若苹果最终采用「Ultra」命名并维持高价策略，其折叠屏 iPhone 将成为市场上最昂贵的主流折叠机型之一。

item.title: 亚马逊「算力帝国」浮出水面，数据中心规模突破 900 座
item.guid: 亚马逊「算力帝国」浮出水面，数据中心规模突破-900-座
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has expanded its data center footprint to over 900 facilities, distributed across more than 50 countries and regions worldwide. This number significantly exceeds previous public estimates. 据彭博社报道，亚马逊云计算部门 AWS 的数据中心规模已突破 900 座，分布在全球超过 50 个国家和地区。这一数字远超外界此前认知。

Internal documents reveal that in addition to traditional large hubs like Virginia and Oregon, AWS also deploys server racks in hundreds of 'colocation facilities,' with these leased spaces contributing approximately one-fifth of its computing power resources. 内部文件显示，除了弗吉尼亚州和俄勒冈州等传统大型枢纽，AWS 还在数百个「托管机房」中部署服务器机架，这些租赁空间贡献了约五分之一的算力资源。

The documents indicate that AWS has established colocation relationships with at least 180 partners, including Equinix, NTT, and local Boston operator Markley. Its colocation scale is particularly significant in locations such as Frankfurt, Tokyo, Seoul, and Singapore. Concurrently, AWS also operates over 220 'edge' sites, providing rapid access points for users in metropolitan areas. 文件指出，AWS 与至少 180 家合作方建立托管关系，涵盖 Equinix、NTT 以及波士顿本地运营商 Markley 等。其在法兰克福、东京、首尔、新加坡等地的托管规模尤为显著。与此同时，AWS 还运营超过 220 个「边缘」站点，为大都市区用户提供快速接入点。

Analysts believe that Amazon prefers owned or long-term leased facilities, especially in core U.S. markets, to ensure efficient management. However, when expanding into new markets or experiencing rapid demand growth, the company also relies on third-party facilities. As of early 2024, AWS was utilizing over 440 colocation data centers, with a total building area of approximately 2.23 million square meters, and a roughly equivalent leased area. 分析人士认为，亚马逊倾向于自有或长期租赁设施，尤其在美国核心市场，以确保高效管理。但在新市场拓展或需求快速增长时，公司也会依赖第三方设施。AWS 在 2024 年初已使用超过 440 个托管数据中心，总建筑面积约 223 万平方米，租赁面积大致相当。

In terms of the competitive landscape, Microsoft and Google are also accelerating the expansion of their AI services, driving growth in their cloud business revenue. Despite this, AWS still achieved $33 billion in revenue and $11.4 billion in operating profit in the third quarter of this year, maintaining its position as Amazon's most profitable business segment. 在竞争格局方面，微软与 Google 也在加速扩张 AI 服务，推动云业务营收增长。尽管如此，AWS 在今年第三季度仍实现 330 亿美元营收和 114 亿美元运营利润，继续保持亚马逊最盈利的业务板块地位。

item.title: 「史上最严」充电宝新规明年实施，七成产能或遭淘汰
item.guid: 「史上最严」充电宝新规明年实施，七成产能或遭淘汰
item.description:
According to Blue Whale Technology, the 'strictest ever' power bank safety standard has entered its countdown to implementation. 据蓝鲸科技报道，「史上最严」充电宝安全标准已进入落地倒计时。

The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology (MIIT) held multiple seminars on the 'Mobile Power Bank Safety Technical Specification' in October and November. The standard has now been largely finalized and is expected to be publicly announced in December, officially released in February 2026, and implemented starting June of the same year. After the new regulations take effect, existing 3C certification requirements will become entirely invalid. 工信部在 10 月与 11 月多次召开《移动电源安全技术规范》研讨会，目前标准已基本定稿，预计将在 12 月公示，并于 2026 年 2 月正式发布，同年 6 月起实施。 新规生效后，现有 3C 认证规定将全面失效。

The new standard proposes dozens of improvement measures across three major areas: the complete device, circuit boards, and battery cells. At the device level, it requires the casing to be marked with the 'recommended service life' and the full name of the contract manufacturer, to enhance traceability. 新标准在整机、线路板、电芯三大领域提出数十项改进措施。整机层面要求外壳必须标注「建议使用寿命」与代工厂全称，以强化溯源能力。

For circuit boards, it mandates the inclusion of an LCD screen or a networked App to display battery health and usage count in real-time. The battery cell section introduces more stringent safety tests, including a puncture test, thermal abuse test conditions elevated to 135℃ for 60 minutes, and overcharge test voltage increased to 1.4 times the specified voltage. 线路板方面强制配备 LCD 屏幕或联网 App，实时显示电池健康度与使用次数。 电芯部分则引入更严苛的安全测试，包括针刺测试、热滥用测试条件提升至 135℃ 60 分钟，以及过充电测试电压提高至规定电压的 1.4 倍。

Industry insiders point out that after the new regulations are implemented, approximately 70% of existing production capacity will be eliminated due to inability to meet technical requirements, and industry concentration will significantly increase. Some companies have already made proactive arrangements; Anker Innovations is collaborating with CATL to develop battery cells compliant with the new national standard, and manufacturers like ATL, BYD, and Sunwoda already have products that have passed the new safety standard tests. 业内人士指出，新规实施后，约七成现有产能因无法满足技术要求将被淘汰，行业集中度将显著提升。部分企业已提前布局，安克创新与宁德时代合作研发符合新国标的电芯，ATL、比亚迪、欣旺达等厂商已有产品通过新版安规测试。

Regarding costs, meeting the new standard is expected to lead to an increase in manufacturing costs of approximately 30%, but industry experts believe that the rise in retail prices will remain within an acceptable range for consumers. The cycle life of new products will increase from 300 times to over 600 times, reducing the cost per use and simultaneously improving safety and cost-effectiveness. 成本方面，满足新标准预计将导致制造成本上涨约 30%，但业内认为终端价格上涨仍在消费者可接受范围内。新产品循环寿命将从 300 次提升至 600 次以上，单位使用成本下降，安全性与性价比同步提升。

item.title: Google 推动 AI 芯片销售，英伟达回应
item.guid: Google-推动-AI-芯片销售，英伟达回应
item.description:
According to The Information, Google has begun pitching a solution to some clients for deploying TPUs in their own data centers. This signifies that Google is accelerating the expansion of its AI chip business, directly challenging Nvidia's dominance in this sector. 据 The Information 报道，Google 已开始向部分客户推销在其自有数据中心部署 TPU 的方案。这意味着 Google 正在加快人工智能芯片业务的扩张步伐，直接挑战英伟达在该领域的主导地位。

Sources reveal that Meta is in talks with Google to invest billions of dollars by 2027 to deploy TPUs in Meta's data centers, and plans to continue leasing Google Cloud chips next year. Currently, Meta primarily relies on Nvidia GPUs, and this potential shift indicates its strategic consideration for diversifying chip supply. 消息人士透露，Meta 正与 Google 商谈在 2027 年投入数十亿美元，将 TPU 部署在 Meta 的数据中心，并计划在明年继续租赁 Google Cloud 的芯片。当前，Meta 主要依赖英伟达 GPU，这一潜在转变显示其在多元化芯片供应上的战略考量。

In the past, Google primarily leased its self-developed Tensor Processing Units (TPUs) to clients through Google Cloud. 过去，Google 主要通过 Google Cloud 向客户租赁自研的张量处理单元（TPU）。

Google Cloud executives have previously stated that if TPU adoption is successful, the company could aim for approximately 10% of Nvidia's annual revenue share, equivalent to a market size of several billion dollars. Google 云部门高层曾表示，若 TPU 推广成功，公司有望争取英伟达约 10% 的年度营收份额，相当于数十亿美元的市场规模。

Some clients wish to use TPUs on-premises to meet higher data security and compliance requirements. Google also emphasizes the advantages of TPUs in scenarios such as high-frequency trading. 部分客户希望在本地使用 TPU，以满足更高的数据安全与合规要求。Google 还强调 TPU 在高频交易等场景中的优势。

Meanwhile, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is closely monitoring Google's technological advancements and actively collaborating with potential TPU users like OpenAI and Anthropic to solidify its dominant position in the GPU market. Nvidia's current market capitalization stands at a staggering $4.36 trillion, making it one of the world's most valuable companies. 与此同时，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋密切关注 Google 的技术进展，并积极与 OpenAI、Anthropic 等潜在 TPU 用户达成合作，以稳固 GPU 市场主导地位。英伟达目前市值高达 4.36 万亿美元，仍是全球市值最高的公司之一。

Nvidia, meanwhile, posted last night expressing its happiness with Google's success, stating, 'They have made tremendous progress in AI, and we continue to supply Google.' 而英伟达昨晚发帖表示，其对 Google 的成功感到高兴，同时称 「他们在人工智能领域取得了巨大进步，我们继续向谷歌供货。」

Nvidia emphasized that its technology is a generation ahead of the industry , and its AI chips are the only platform capable of running all AI models and operating in any computing environment. 英伟达强调， 自己的技术领先行业一代 ，其 AI 芯片是唯一能够运行所有人工智能模型并在任何计算场所运行的平台。

It also stated that Nvidia's own chips offer higher performance, versatility, and interchangeability compared to ASICs designed specifically for certain AI frameworks or functions. 其还表示，与专为特定人工智能框架或功能设计的 ASIC 相比，英伟达自己的芯片提供更高的性能、通用性和可替代性。

item.title: Spotify 计划 2026 年再涨美国订阅价格
item.guid: Spotify-计划-2026-年再涨美国订阅价格
item.description:
The Financial Times, citing three informed sources, reported that Spotify plans to raise its US subscription prices again in the first quarter of 2026. Major record labels are pressuring Apple and Spotify to increase prices on the two major music streaming platforms to counter inflation and rising industry costs. 《金融时报》援引三位知情人士称，Spotify 计划在 2026 年第一季度再次上调美国订阅价格。主要唱片公司正向苹果与 Spotify 施压，要求两大音乐流媒体平台提高价格，以应对通胀与行业成本上涨。

Last year, Spotify had already raised prices in the US, and in August this year, it adjusted prices in several international markets. 去年，Spotify 已在美国进行过一次涨价，并在今年 8 月对多个国际市场调整价格。

Currently, Spotify Premium's monthly fee in the US is $11.99, while Apple Music's price is $10.99. Record labels believe that music streaming pricing is too low compared to video platforms like Netflix, failing to reflect the value of the content. 目前，Spotify Premium 在美国的月费为 11.99 美元，而 Apple Music 的价格为 10.99 美元。唱片公司认为，音乐流媒体的定价与 Netflix 等视频平台相比偏低，未能体现内容价值。

item.title: 阿里巴巴 CEO：至少三年内，AI 泡沫是不太存在的
item.guid: 阿里巴巴-CEO：至少三年内，AI-泡沫是不太存在的
item.description:
Yesterday, Alibaba Group announced its second-quarter results for fiscal year 2026. The financial report showed that the group's revenue reached 247.80 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 4.8%, slightly higher than the market estimate of 245.2 billion yuan; adjusted earnings per ADS were 4.36 yuan, lower than the estimated 6.34 yuan. The adjusted net profit for the same period was 10.35 billion yuan, also lower than the market expectation of 16.8 billion yuan. 昨日，阿里巴巴集团公布 2026 财年第二季度业绩。财报显示，集团营收达 2,478.0 亿元，同比增长 4.8%，略高于市场预估的 2,452 亿元；调整后每 ADS 收益为 4.36 元，低于预估的 6.34 元。同期调整后净利润为 103.5 亿元，亦低于市场预期的 168 亿元。

In terms of core businesses, the Cloud Intelligence Group performed outstandingly, with second-quarter revenue reaching 39.82 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 34%, exceeding the market estimate of 37.99 billion yuan. The financial report noted that AI-related product revenue has achieved triple-digit year-on-year growth for nine consecutive quarters, becoming an important engine driving overall performance. 在核心业务方面，云智能集团表现突出，第二季度收入达 398.2 亿元，同比增长 34%，超出市场预估的 379.9 亿元。财报指出，AI 相关产品收入已连续 9 个季度实现三位数同比增长，成为推动整体业绩的重要引擎。

The detailed financial report shows that the growth in public cloud revenue is the main driving force, with the adoption rate of AI products continuously increasing. 详细财报显示，公共云收入的增长是主要驱动力，其中 AI 产品采用率持续提升。

Alibaba Cloud continues to increase its investment in large AI models, launching multiple products including the trillion-parameter Qwen3-Max, programming model Qwen3-Coder, visual understanding model Qwen3-VL, full-modality model Qwen3-Omni, and the next-generation architecture Qwen3-Next. Among them, Qwen3-Max achieved leading results in multiple international tests, even scoring full marks in mathematical reasoning tests, marking a breakthrough for domestic large models. 阿里云在 AI 大模型领域持续加码，推出包括超万亿参数的 Qwen3-Max、编程模型 Qwen3-Coder、视觉理解模型 Qwen3-VL、全模态模型 Qwen3-Omni 以及下一代架构 Qwen3-Next 等多款产品。其中，Qwen3-Max 在多项国际测试中取得领先成绩，在数学推理测试中更是达到满分表现，标志着国内大模型的突破。

In addition, Alibaba Cloud continues to expand its global infrastructure layout, announcing new regional nodes in Brazil, France, and the Netherlands, and activating data centers in Dubai and Malaysia. Currently, its global coverage has reached 29 regions and 92 availability zones. 此外，阿里云在全球基础设施布局上继续扩展，宣布将在巴西、法国、荷兰新建地域节点，并启用迪拜和马来西亚数据中心。目前其全球覆盖已达 29 个地域、92 个可用区。

During the conference call following the release of Alibaba's financial report, Alibaba CEO Eddie Wu stated, "The AI bubble is unlikely to exist for at least three years." He mentioned that the deployment pace of Alibaba Cloud's AI servers and other equipment severely lags behind customer demand, and outstanding orders are still increasing. 而在阿里财报发布后的电话会上，阿里巴巴 CEO 吴泳铭如此表示， 「至少三年内，AI 泡沫是不太存在的。」 他提到阿里云 AI 服务器等上架节奏严重跟不上客户需求，在手订单仍在进一步增加。

Additionally, according to Jiang Fan, CEO of Alibaba's China Digital Commerce Group, Taobao Flash Sale has completed its first phase of rapid scale expansion, and in the second phase, by optimizing user experience, improving order structure, and logistics efficiency, it has achieved a 50% reduction in per-order losses compared to previous months. 另外，据阿里巴巴中国电商事业群 CEO 蒋凡介绍，淘宝闪购已完成第一阶段的快速规模扩张， 并在第二阶段通过优化用户体验、提升订单结构及物流效率，实现每单亏损较前几个月下降一半。

item.title: 蔚来发三季度财报：营收突破 217.9 亿元，交付量创新高
item.guid: 蔚来发三季度财报：营收突破-217.9-亿元，交付量创新高
item.description:
Yesterday, on its 11th anniversary, NIO released its third-quarter financial report for 2025. The data showed that the company achieved total revenue of RMB 21.79 billion (approximately USD 3.06 billion) in the quarter, a year-on-year increase of 16.7% and a quarter-on-quarter increase of 14.7%. 昨天，正值 11 周年纪念日，蔚来发布 2025 年第三季度财报。数据显示，公司在该季度实现总营收人民币 217.9 亿元（约合 30.6 亿美元），同比增长 16.7%，环比增长 14.7%。

Quarterly vehicle deliveries reached 87,071 units, a year-on-year increase of 40.8% and a quarter-on-quarter increase of 20.8%, setting a new record. Of these: 季度整车交付量达到 87071 辆，同比增长 40.8%，环比增长 20.8%，创下新高。其中：

    NIO brand contributed 36,928 units;

    ONVO brand delivered 37,656 units;

    FIREFLY brand delivered 12,487 units.

Vehicle sales revenue was RMB 19.20 billion, a year-on-year increase of 15% and a quarter-on-quarter increase of 19%. Vehicle gross margin improved to 14.7%, a significant improvement from 13.1% in the same period last year and 10.3% in the previous quarter. 车辆销售收入为人民币 192.0 亿元，同比增长 15%，环比增长 19%。车辆毛利率提升至 14.7%，较去年同期的 13.1%和上一季度的 10.3%均有显著改善。

Regarding profit and loss: 利润和亏损方面：

    Gross profit was RMB 3.02 billion, a year-on-year increase of 50.7% and a quarter-on-quarter increase of 59.4%. Overall gross margin rose to 13.9%, the highest level in nearly three years;

    Operating loss narrowed to RMB 3.52 billion, a year-on-year decrease of 32.8% and a quarter-on-quarter decrease of 28.3%; net loss was RMB 3.48 billion, a year-on-year decrease of 31.2% and a quarter-on-quarter decrease of 30.3%;

    The company's cash and equivalents, restricted funds, short-term investments, and long-term deposits totaled RMB 36.7 billion.

In the latest developments, NIO's October deliveries reached 40,397 vehicles, with cumulative deliveries for 2025 reaching 241,618 vehicles, and historical cumulative deliveries surpassing 913,000 vehicles. The company expects fourth-quarter deliveries to be between 120,000 and 125,000 vehicles, a year-on-year increase of 65.1% to 72%, potentially setting a new quarterly delivery record. 在最新进展中，蔚来 10 月交付量达 40397 辆，2025 年累计交付已达 241618 辆，历史累计交付突破 91.3 万辆。公司预计第四季度交付量将在 12 万至 12.5 万辆之间，同比增长 65.1% 至 72%，有望创下季度交付纪录。

Regarding its energy and service network, NIO has cumulatively built 8,471 charging and battery swap stations, including 3,641 battery swap stations, 4,830 charging stations, and 27,510 charging piles. Its nationwide network includes 349 service centers and a road service team of over 7,000 people, covering 32 provinces and 333 prefecture-level administrative regions, providing over 2.47 million services to users. 在能源与服务网络方面，蔚来已累计建成 8471 座充换电站，其中换电站 3641 座、充电站 4830 座、充电桩 27510 根。全国范围内的 349 家服务中心和超过 7,000 人的道路服务团队，覆盖 32 省、333 个地级行政区，为用户提供超过 247 万次服务。

NIO CEO William Li stated that the growth in third-quarter deliveries benefited from the competitiveness of its multi-brand product portfolio, and the company is accelerating production and expects record-breaking deliveries in the fourth quarter. 蔚来 CEO 李斌表示，三季度交付量的增长得益于多品牌产品组合的竞争力，公司正加速生产并预计四季度交付创纪录。

CFO Yu Qu emphasized that with cost optimization and increased contributions from high-margin models, the company's gross profit margin has significantly improved, operating losses continue to narrow, and cash flow remains robust, laying a solid foundation for long-term growth. CFO 曲玉则强调，随着成本优化和高毛利车型贡献增加，公司毛利率显著改善，运营亏损持续收窄，现金流状况稳健，为长期增长奠定基础。

item.title: 马斯克：其他车企都不想要 FSD 授权
item.guid: 马斯克：其他车企都不想要-FSD-授权
item.description:
According to Electrek, Tesla CEO Elon Musk admitted yesterday that other automakers are unwilling to license Tesla's "Full Self-Driving" (FSD) system. This move essentially means the collapse of Tesla's long-standing strategic plan to open-license its FSD technology. 据 Electrek 报道，特斯拉 CEO Elon Musk 昨天承认，其他汽车制造商并不愿意授权使用特斯拉的「全自动驾驶」（FSD）系统。此举意味着特斯拉长期以来关于 FSD 技术开放授权的战略计划基本破局。

Musk stated on X that although Tesla has repeatedly offered to license FSD, the conditions proposed by other automakers were described by him as "unfeasible demands." Musk 在 X 上表示，尽管特斯拉曾多次提出愿意授权 FSD，但其他车企提出的条件被其形容为「不可行的要求」。

He emphasized that traditional automakers, during discussions, often only consider small-scale pilot programs within the next five years and demand that Tesla bear system safety responsibility, which fundamentally conflicts with Tesla's existing "supervised" software deployment model. 他强调，传统车企在讨论时往往只考虑在未来五年内的小规模试点，并要求特斯拉承担系统安全责任，这与特斯拉现有的「监督版」软件部署模式存在根本冲突。

As early as 2021, Musk revealed initial contacts with some automakers, and in 2024, he claimed that an agreement with a "major automaker" was likely, but it ultimately did not materialize. 早在 2021 年，Musk 就曾透露与部分车企进行初步接触，并在 2024 年声称与一家「大型车企」有望达成协议，但最终未能实现。

Ford CEO Jim Farley previously publicly denied using FSD, stating bluntly, "Waymo is better." Meanwhile, automakers like Toyota have chosen to partner with Waymo to integrate its autonomous driving technology into consumer vehicles. 福特 CEO Jim Farley 此前公开否认使用 FSD，直言「Waymo 更好」。与此同时，丰田等车企已选择与 Waymo 合作，将其自动驾驶技术整合至消费车型。

Traditional automakers generally adopt a strict "V-model" verification process and assume legal responsibility when launching autonomous driving systems. For example, Mercedes-Benz explicitly accepted full legal responsibility for the vehicle during system activation when it released its L3 Drive Pilot system. 传统车企普遍采用严格的「V 模型」验证流程，并在推出自动驾驶系统时承担法律责任。例如，奔驰在发布 L3 级 Drive Pilot 系统时明确接受车辆在系统启用期间的全部法律责任。

In contrast, Tesla relies on users to test "beta/supervised" software in real-world road environments, leading to multiple investigations and lawsuits. Just this month, Tesla reached a settlement in a case involving Autopilot hitting a police car, avoiding a jury verdict. 相比之下，特斯拉依赖用户在真实道路环境中测试「beta/监督版」软件，导致多起调查与诉讼。就在本月，特斯拉刚刚与一起涉及 Autopilot 撞上警车的案件达成和解，避免了陪审团裁决。

Industry analysis points out that the core reason automakers refuse to license FSD lies in legal risks and safety responsibilities. Electrek commented that the so-called "unfeasible demands" are actually automakers requiring the system to avoid hitting stationary objects (like police cars), which Tesla currently cannot guarantee. 业内分析指出，车企拒绝授权 FSD 的核心原因在于法律风险与安全责任。Electrek 评论称，所谓「不可行的要求」，实际上是车企要求系统避免撞上静止物体（如警车），但特斯拉现阶段无法保证这一点。

item.title: 调查显示 72% 大学生依赖社交平台获取新闻
item.guid: 调查显示-72%-大学生依赖社交平台获取新闻
item.description:
According to The Verge, a recent survey shows a significant shift in how American college students get their news. 据 The Verge 报道，最新调查显示，美国大学生在新闻获取方式上正呈现显著转变。

Approximately 72% of students primarily rely on TikTok and Instagram for news, while only about 20% regularly read traditional newspapers. Although most students believe newspapers are more accurate, half of the respondents still expressed "at least some trust" in news content from social platforms. 约 72% 的学生主要依赖 TikTok 与 Instagram 获取新闻，而仅有约 20% 的学生经常阅读传统报纸。尽管多数学生认为报纸更准确，但仍有一半受访者表示「至少有些信任」社交平台的新闻内容。

The report points out that TikTok news influencer Dylan Page (nicknamed "News Daddy") has become a representative figure, with his videos accumulating over 1.5 billion likes. 报道指出，TikTok 上的新闻网红 Dylan Page（昵称「新闻老爸 News Daddy」）已成为代表性人物，其视频累计点赞超过 15 亿。

Although students are generally aware that algorithms create "information cocoons," they remain addicted to the convenience and immediacy of social media. Some students verify news by searching on Google or checking comment sections after seeing it, but the depth of verification is limited. 尽管学生们普遍意识到算法会制造「信息茧房」，但仍沉迷于社交媒体的便利与即时性。部分学生在看到新闻后会通过 Google 搜索或评论区进行验证，但验证深度有限。

Professor Karen North of the University of Southern California stated that the top three channels for students to get news are TikTok, Instagram, and classroom discussions, but classroom influence is far less than that of social platforms. She emphasized that many students only look at AI -generated search summaries and do not delve into reading news reports. 南加州大学教授 Karen North 表示，学生获取新闻的前三大渠道是 TikTok、Instagram 与课堂讨论，但课堂影响力远低于社交平台。 她强调，许多学生只看 AI 生成的搜索摘要，而不深入阅读新闻报道。

Furthermore, AI deepfake content is rapidly spreading on social platforms. Recently, incidents ranging from "rabbit trampoline videos" to fake "dolphin trainer death" events have caused widespread misinformation on TikTok, making it difficult for millions of users to distinguish truth from falsehood. Some students even upload AI-generated humorous images or videos, which are then mistakenly believed by a large audience. 此外，AI 深伪内容在社交平台上快速传播。近期从「兔子蹦床视频」到虚假的「海豚训练员死亡」事件均在 TikTok 上引发广泛误导，数百万用户难以分辨真假。部分学生甚至上传 AI 生成的搞笑图片或视频，结果被大量观众误信。

The survey also showed that 83% of Americans did not pay for news in the past year. College students are more inclined to choose free, instant social platforms rather than paid traditional media. Most students only focus on the first wave of trending news and lack follow-up on subsequent developments. Some respondents believe that as they grow older, they may gradually shift to traditional media, but currently still rely on algorithm-driven social platforms. 调查还显示，83% 的美国人过去一年未为新闻付费。 大学生更倾向于选择免费、即时的社交平台，而非付费的传统媒体。 多数学生只关注第一波热点新闻，对后续发展缺乏跟进。部分受访者认为，随着成长，他们可能会逐渐转向传统媒体，但目前仍依赖算法驱动的社交平台。

item.title: 亚马逊禁止员工使用第三方 AI 编程工具
item.guid: 亚马逊禁止员工使用第三方-AI-编程工具
item.description:
According to Reuters, Amazon recently issued an internal memo requiring engineers to prioritize the use of the company's self-developed AI coding tool "Kiro" over third-party products. 据路透社报道，Amazon 内部近日发布备忘录，要求工程师优先使用公司自研的 AI 编码工具「Kiro」，而非第三方产品。

The memo states that Amazon will no longer support new third-party AI development tools, meaning popular tools including OpenAI's "Codex," Anthropic's "Claude Code," and startup Cursor will be excluded from recommendations. 备忘录指出，Amazon 将不再支持新增的第三方 AI 开发工具，这意味着包括 OpenAI 的「Codex」、Anthropic 的「Claude Code」以及初创公司 Cursor 在内的热门工具将被排除在推荐之外。

It is worth noting that despite Amazon having invested approximately $8 billion in Anthropic and signed a 7-year, $38 billion cloud service agreement with OpenAI, the company still chooses to prioritize the promotion of Kiro in its internal development. 值得注意的是，尽管 Amazon 已向 Anthropic 投资约 80 亿美元，并与 OpenAI 签订了为期 7 年、价值 380 亿美元的云服务协议，公司仍选择在内部开发中优先推广 Kiro。

Kiro was officially launched in July this year, positioned as a natural language-driven code generation tool that helps developers quickly build websites and applications. The tool partially relies on Anthropic's technical version but does not directly use Claude Code. Last week, Amazon expanded Kiro's usage globally and simultaneously launched new features. Kiro 于今年 7 月正式推出，定位为自然语言驱动的代码生成工具，可帮助开发者快速构建网站与应用。该工具部分依赖于 Anthropic 的技术版本，但并未直接使用 Claude Code。上周，Amazon 已将 Kiro 的使用范围扩展至全球，并同步上线新功能。

This internal policy was jointly signed by AWS Senior Vice President Peter DeSantis and Senior Vice President of E-commerce Infrastructure Dave Treadwell, emphasizing that "Kiro will become Amazon's recommended AI-native development tool." 此次内部政策由 AWS 高级副总裁 Peter DeSantis 与电商基础设施高级副总裁 Dave Treadwell 联合签署，强调「Kiro 将成为 Amazon 推荐的 AI 原生开发工具」。

Previously, Amazon had marked Codex as "Do Not Use" in internal documents, and Claude Code was also once on a similar list, but was later withdrawn due to external questioning. 此前，Amazon 曾在内部文件中将 Codex 标记为「请勿使用 Do Not Use」，Claude Code 也一度被列入同类名单，后因外部质疑而撤销。

item.title: Vibe coding 工具被指护城河不足，「被抄袭」风险突出
item.guid: Vibe-coding-工具被指护城河不足，「被抄袭」风险突出
item.description:
According to Business Insider, the "risk of being copied" for Vibe coding tools is attracting industry attention. 据《商业内幕》报道，Vibe coding 工具的「被复制风险」正在引发行业关注。

Maor Shlomo, founder of the well-known vibe coding platform Base44, stated in a podcast that startups relying on prompt (prompt) engineering or lightweight fine-tuning find it difficult to build a moat, and the user interface part is often the easiest for competitors to imitate. 知名 vibe coding 平台 Base44 创始人 Maor Shlomo 在播客节目中表示， 这类依赖提示（prompt）工程或轻量微调的初创公司难以建立护城河，用户界面部分往往是最容易被竞争对手模仿的。

He pointed out that what is truly difficult to replicate is the underlying infrastructure, including databases, authentication systems, user management, and analytics tools. 他指出，真正难以复制的是底层基础设施，包括数据库、认证系统、用户管理和分析工具。

Base44, initially a self-funded project, quickly attracted hundreds of thousands of users and was acquired by Wix for approximately $80 million in June this year. In its August financial report, Wix projected that the platform could achieve $40-50 million in annual recurring revenue by the end of 2025. Base44 曾作为自筹项目快速吸引数十万用户，并在今年 6 月被 Wix 以约 8000 万美元收购。Wix 在 8 月财报中预计，该平台到 2025 年底可实现 4000–5000 万美元的年经常性收入。

Shlomo emphasized that building a software platform capable of meeting complex real-world scenarios requires multi-layer integration and numerous prompts, far beyond what simple interface generation can support. He warned that startups relying solely on "clever prompts" or "lightweight fine-tuning" would struggle to maintain long-term competitiveness. Shlomo 强调，构建能满足复杂真实场景的软件平台需要多层集成和大量提示，远非简单的界面生成所能支撑。他警告称，初创公司若仅依赖「巧妙提示」或「轻量微调」将难以维持长期竞争力。

Meanwhile, investor interest in the Vibe coding sector continues to accelerate. According to a joint analysis by a16z and Mercury, platforms like Replit, Cursor, Loveable, and Emergent have entered the forefront of AI-native application spending. 与此同时，投资者对 Vibe coding 赛道的投入仍在加速。根据 a16z 与 Mercury 的联合分析，Replit、Cursor、Loveable、Emergent 等平台已进入 AI 原生应用支出前列。

In terms of funding, Replit completed a $250 million funding round in September, reaching a valuation of $3 billion; Loveable completed a $200 million Series A funding round in July, with a valuation of $1.8 billion; and Cursor announced this month the completion of a $2.3 billion funding round, with a valuation as high as $29.3 billion. 融资规模方面，Replit 在 9 月完成 2.5 亿美元融资，估值达 30 亿美元；Loveable 在 7 月完成 2 亿美元 A 轮融资，估值 18 亿美元；Cursor 则在本月宣布完成 23 亿美元融资，估值高达 293 亿美元。

The report suggests that despite the fragility of their business models, Vibe coding tools are rapidly expanding and becoming a key focus for capital markets. 报道认为，尽管商业模式存在脆弱性，Vibe coding 工具仍在快速扩张，并成为资本市场的重点关注对象。

item.title: 💡 AI 教育公司创始人：未来一对一 AI 教学将成主流
item.guid: 💡-AI-教育公司创始人：未来一对一-AI-教学将成主流
item.description:
According to "Intelligent Emergence," Liu Wei, co-founder and COO of "Dancing with Love," recently stated in an interview that there are fundamental differences in the core logic between AI education and traditional online education. 据《智能涌现》报道，「与爱为舞」联合创始人兼 COO 刘威近日在接受采访时表示，AI 教育与传统在线教育的核心逻辑存在本质差异。

He likened online education to "agriculture," relying on the expansion of teacher scale; while AI education is "technology," where competitive barriers come from technological breakthroughs rather than human resource accumulation. 他将在线教育比喻为「农业」，依赖教师规模扩张；而 AI 教育则是「科技」，竞争壁垒来自技术突破而非人力堆叠。

Liu Wei emphasized that one-on-one teaching will become mainstream in the AI era, naturally superior to large group classes in terms of effectiveness and efficiency. He pointed out that the generalization and autonomous learning mechanisms of large AI models make personalized teaching possible. 刘威强调，一对一教学将在 AI 时代成为主流，效果和效率天然优于大班课。 他指出，AI 大模型的泛化性与自主学习机制，使得个性化教学成为可能。

No matter how excellent a teacher is, the child is the subject of learning, and teachers cannot guarantee a certain improvement in grades. Over-promising score increases is irresponsible.

Liu Wei stated that the value of AI education lies in improving the stability and efficiency of the learning process, rather than focusing solely on a single score metric. 刘威表示，AI 教育的价值在于提升学习过程的稳定性与效率，而非单一分数指标。

Regarding user acceptance, Liu Wei revealed that "iXue" showed a high course completion rate in blind tests, even surpassing that of real large group classes. After parents and students learned that the teacher was AI, the withdrawal rate was almost zero, and the payment rate was also higher than traditional models. 在用户接受度方面，刘威透露，「爱学」在盲测中表现出较高的完课率，甚至超过真人大班课。家长与学生在得知教师为 AI 后，退课率几乎为零，付费率也高于传统模式。

He believes that with the rapid development of AI technology, parents' acceptance of AI education is increasing, and one-on-one AI teaching will gradually replace large class instruction in the future. 他认为，随着 AI 技术的快速发展，家长对 AI 教育的接受度正在提升，未来一对一 AI 教学将逐渐取代大班课。

Liu Wei also pointed out that AI education's strategy should not be limited to a specific group or subject, but rather possess the ability to cover all populations and expand to multiple languages. He stated that AI technology can bridge the differences between various age groups and subjects, and future product iterations will be faster and broader. 刘威还指出，AI 教育的战略不应局限于某一人群或学科，而是具备全人群覆盖与多语言扩展能力。他表示，AI 技术能够抹平不同年龄段与学科的差异，未来产品迭代将更快、更广。

"Dancing with Love" was co-founded by Zhang Huaiting, former head of Baidu's Phoenix Nest core, and Liu Wei. Established two and a half years ago, its valuation has approached $1 billion, and it has completed 4 rounds of financing, with a cumulative financing amount of approximately $150 million. 「与爱为舞」由前百度凤巢核心负责人张怀亭与刘威共同创立，成立两年半，估值已接近 10 亿美元，并完成 4 轮融资，累计融资额约 1.5 亿美元。

The company's core R&D directions include AI digital human teachers, real-time audio and video conversational AI education models, and intelligent interactive voice models. Its self-developed voice system achieves a recognition accuracy of 95% and a response speed of milliseconds. 公司核心研发方向包括 AI 数字人教师、音视频实时对话式 AI 教育模型及智能交互语音模型。其自研语音系统识别准确率达 95%，响应速度达到毫秒级。

item.title: iPad mini 8 将升级 OLED，高刷仍旧缺席
item.guid: iPad-mini-8-将升级-OLED，高刷仍旧缺席
item.description:
According to Wccftech, the iPad mini 8 will be released in the third or fourth quarter of 2026. Its screen size will remain at 8.4 inches, but it will be upgraded from the iPad mini 7's IPS LCD panel to OLED. This change means the iPad mini series will become Apple's second tablet device to adopt OLED, following the iPad Pro. 据 Wccftech 报道，iPad mini 8 将在 2026 年第三或第四季度发布，屏幕尺寸维持在 8.4 英寸，但将从 iPad mini 7 的 IPS LCD 面板升级为 OLED。这一变化意味着 iPad mini 系列将成为继 iPad Pro 之后，苹果第二款采用 OLED 的平板设备。

The report states that the new iPad mini will not feature the LTPO technology found on the iPad Pro, nor will it support ProMotion high refresh rates. This choice offers a cost advantage and further highlights Apple's strategy for product line differentiation. 报道称，新款 iPad mini 上并不会搭载 iPad Pro 上的 LTPO 技术，也不支持 ProMotion 高刷新率。这种选择在成本上更具优势，但也进一步凸显了苹果在产品线区隔上的策略。

Regarding the supply chain, Samsung is expected to begin mass production in July 2025, providing Apple with approximately 3 million OLED panels annually. 供应链方面，三星预计将在 2025 年 7 月开始量产，为苹果每年提供约 300 万块 OLED 面板。

The report believes that due to the screen upgrade, the price of the iPad mini 8 will also increase. Meanwhile, Apple plans to introduce OLED technology to the iPad Air only in 2028, to maintain product line stratification. 报道认为，由于屏幕升级，iPad mini 8 的价格也会随之提升。与此同时，苹果计划在 2028 年才为 iPad Air 引入 OLED 技术，以保持产品线的分层。

Additionally, the report states that Apple also plans to launch the MacBook Pro M6 during the same period. This model will feature an OLED screen, a thinner body, and will eliminate the notch design. 此外，报道称苹果还计划在同期推出 MacBook Pro M6，该机型将采用 OLED 屏幕，机身更薄，并取消刘海设计。

item.title: 腾讯混元开源轻量 OCR 模型，刷新行业榜单
item.guid: 腾讯混元开源轻量-OCR-模型，刷新行业榜单
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Hunyuan announced the open-sourcing of its new lightweight OCR model 'HunyuanOCR', which achieved SOTA results on multiple industry OCR application rankings with only 1B parameters. 昨天，腾讯混元宣布开源全新轻量 OCR 模型「HunyuanOCR」，仅凭 1B 参数规模在多项业界 OCR 应用榜单上取得 SOTA 成绩。

Built upon Hunyuan's native multimodal architecture, the model possesses leading capabilities in complex document parsing and multilingual recognition. 该模型依托混元原生多模态架构打造，在复杂文档解析与多语种识别方面具备领先能力。

HunyuanOCR's design adopts an end-to-end paradigm, combining a native resolution video encoder, an adaptive visual adapter, and a lightweight language model, which results in superior inference efficiency compared to common cascaded solutions in the industry. HunyuanOCR 的设计采用端到端范式，结合原生分辨率视频编码器、自适应视觉适配器和轻量化语言模型，在推理效率上优于业界常见的级联方案。

In terms of performance, the model scored 94.1 in the OmniDocBench evaluation, surpassing leading models like Google Gemini 3-pro; it also set a new best performance for models under 3B with a score of 860 on the OCRBench ranking. 性能方面，该模型在 OmniDocBench 测评中获得 94.1 分，超越 Google Gemini 3-pro 等领先模型；在 OCRBench 榜单上以 860 分成绩刷新了 3B 以下模型的最佳表现。

At the application level, HunyuanOCR can cover nine major scenarios including documents, artistic text, street views, handwriting, advertisements, receipts, screenshots, games, and videos, supporting receipt field extraction, video subtitle recognition, and photo translation. Its multilingual support covers 14 high-frequency minor languages and it won first place in the small model track of the ICDAR2025 Document Translation Competition. 应用层面，HunyuanOCR 能够覆盖文档、艺术字、街景、手写、广告、票据、截屏、游戏、视频等九大场景，支持票据字段抽取、视频字幕识别以及拍照翻译。其多语种支持能力覆盖 14 种高频小语种，并在 ICDAR2025 文档翻译比赛小模型赛道中夺冠。

The model is now available for download and experience on GitHub and Hugging Face platforms. 该模型已在 GitHub 与 Hugging Face 平台开放下载和体验。

item.title: 星巴克深圳 300 家门店全面上线「每日早餐」系列
item.guid: 星巴克深圳-300-家门店全面上线「每日早餐」系列
item.description:
Yesterday, Starbucks Shenzhen's 'Daily Breakfast' series was fully launched, covering over 300 stores across the city. 昨天，深圳星巴克「每日早餐」系列全面上市，覆盖全城超过 300 家门店。

The series focuses on value for money and diverse choices, offering 2 new coffees and 15 popular food items, which can be combined into over 60 different pairings, aiming to start customers' day with energy through a cup of coffee and a nutritious breakfast. 该系列主打质价比与多样化选择，提供 2 款全新咖啡与 15 款人气食品，可组合出 60 多种搭配方案，旨在通过一杯咖啡与一份营养早餐，为顾客开启充满活力的一天。

During breakfast hours, customers can purchase a specified coffee beverage paired with a specified food item at designated stores, enjoying a discounted combo price of 25.9 yuan, 28.9 yuan, or 31.9 yuan. 在早餐时段，顾客可于指定门店购买一杯指定咖啡饮品，搭配一款指定食品，以 25.9 元、28.9 元或 31.9 元的组合价享受优惠。

New coffee products include 'Daily Fresh Brewed Black Coffee' and 'Daily Fresh Brewed Milk Coffee'. The former emphasizes a smooth and clean taste, while the latter highlights layered aromas and a silky experience. 新品咖啡包括「每日黑咖新鲜萃」与「每日奶咖新鲜萃」，前者强调顺滑干净的口感，后者则突出层次香气与丝滑体验。

Customers can also randomly unlock three origin flavors: Kenya's bright and refreshing citrus berry notes, Colombia's balanced nutty flavor, and Sumatra's herbal and spicy notes. Coffee beans will rotate regularly, and customers can freely choose hot or cold drinks, and customize sweetness, drizzles, and ice levels. 顾客还可随机解锁三大产地风味：肯亚的明亮清爽与柑橘莓果风味、哥伦比亚的均衡坚果风味，以及苏门答腊的草本与香料风味。咖啡豆将定期轮换，顾客可自由选择热饮或冷饮，并定制甜度、淋酱与冰量。

Regarding food, 15 popular items cover baked goods and sandwiches, including classic pineapple buns, juicy crispy sausage rolls, and various bagels, catering to both 'sweet tooth' and 'savory' preferences. Since its trial operation in September this year, the 'Daily Fresh Brewed Black Coffee + Sandwich' combo has become a popular choice. 食品方面，15 款人气单品涵盖烘焙点心与三明治，包括经典菠萝包、爆汁脆肠酥皮卷及各式贝果，满足「甜党」与「咸党」的不同口味偏好。自今年 9 月试运营以来，「每日黑咖新鲜萃 + 三明治」组合已成为人气之选。

item.title: 雀巢中国曝销售架构调整，王雷出任电商负责人
item.guid: 雀巢中国曝销售架构调整，王雷出任电商负责人
item.description:
According to Xiaoshidai, Nestlé China announced significant personnel and organizational structure adjustments at the end of 2025. 据小食代报道，雀巢中国在 2025 年底宣布重要人事与组织架构调整。

Recently, Nestlé Greater China CEO Mark East informed employees that Wang Lei, the current Head of Dairy Business, will officially assume the role of 'Head of Omni-channel Retail Food & E-commerce' starting December 1, 2025, and will continue to serve as Head of Dairy Business until further notice. 近日，雀巢大中华区 CEO 马凯思向员工通报，现任奶品业务负责人王雷将于 2025 年 12 月 1 日起正式担任「全渠道流通食品零售及电子商务负责人」，并继续兼任奶品业务负责人直至另行通知。

Wang Lei joined Nestlé in 2011, where she drove digital transformation in the e-commerce team and took on the same role in 2022, during which she built a diverse team and achieved significant growth. 王雷自 2011 年加入雀巢，曾在电子商务团队推动数字化转型，并于 2022 年出任同一岗位，期间组建多元化团队并实现显著增长。

After temporarily assuming the role in May this year, she quickly stabilized the team and brought the business back on track. Mark East praised her 'strategic vision and operational capabilities' as bringing immense value to Nestlé China. 她在今年 5 月临时承担该职务后，迅速稳定团队并恢复业务轨道。马凯思评价其「战略眼光与运营能力」将为雀巢中国带来巨大价值。

Concurrently, Nestlé China plans to integrate the e-commerce sales teams for its coffee, dairy, and confectionery businesses into a unified Omni-channel Retail Food & E-commerce business unit, effective January 1, 2026. 与此同时，雀巢中国计划自 2026 年 1 月 1 日起整合咖啡、奶品和糖果业务的电商销售团队，统一纳入全渠道流通食品零售及电子商务业务单元。

Yang He, the current Head of Coffee E-commerce Sales, will be promoted to Head of E-commerce, reporting directly to Wang Lei. This move aims to enhance scaled operational efficiency and build a centralized and highly efficient 'mega e-commerce' system. 现任咖啡电商销售负责人杨荷将升任电子商务负责人，直接向王雷汇报。此举旨在提升规模化运营效率，打造集中高效的「大电商」体系。

According to Nestlé's financial report, in 2024, sales in the Greater China dairy and ice cream sector reached 1.017 billion Swiss francs, approximately 8.3 billion RMB, accounting for 20.5% of total sales. Amidst the trend of diversified channels in the Chinese consumer market, Nestlé hopes to strengthen online channel synergy and drive demand-driven growth through a "chessboard" style e-commerce layout. 根据雀巢财报，2024 年大中华区奶制品和冰淇淋板块销售额达 10.17 亿瑞士法郎，约合人民币 83 亿元，占总销售额的 20.5%。在中国消费市场渠道多元化趋势下，雀巢希望通过「一盘棋」式电商布局，强化线上渠道协同，推动需求驱动型增长。

item.title: 达美乐比萨 CEO 卸任
item.guid: 达美乐比萨-CEO-卸任
item.description:
According to Reuters, Domino's Pizza Group announced yesterday that its CEO Andrew Rennie stepped down from his position on November 25. 据路透社报道，达美乐比萨集团（Domino’s Pizza Group）昨日宣布其 CEO Andrew Rennie 已于 11 月 25 日卸任职务。

The company stated that the adjustment was mutually agreed upon, and Rennie also resigned from his position as a board director. Current Chief Operating Officer Nicola Frampton will temporarily take over as CEO and join the board. 公司表示，此次调整经双方协商一致，Rennie 同时辞去董事会董事一职。现任首席运营官 Nicola Frampton 将临时接任 CEO，并加入董事会。

This personnel change occurs at a critical stage of the company's strategic transformation. Domino's UK business is attempting to expand its product lines beyond core pizzas, including chicken products and healthier dining options, to address market competition and changes in consumer demand. 此次人事变动发生在公司战略转型的关键阶段。达美乐英国业务正尝试拓展核心披萨之外的产品线，包括鸡肉类和更健康的餐饮选择，以应对市场竞争和消费需求变化。

In September, the company appointed Andrew Andrea as the new Chief Financial Officer and plans to re-examine capital allocation priorities. 9 月，公司已任命新任首席财务官 Andrew Andrea，并计划重新审视资本分配优先事项。

Previously, Domino's UK had warned that weak demand might continue to affect orders until 2026. The board has initiated a formal selection process for a CEO successor and postponed the capital markets day event originally scheduled for December. 此前，达美乐英国曾警告，疲弱的需求可能持续影响订单直至 2026 年。董事会已启动 CEO 继任者的正式遴选程序，并推迟原定于 12 月举行的资本市场日活动。

item.title: 《疯狂动物城 2》 今日上映，零点场票房登顶
item.guid: 《疯狂动物城-2》-今日上映，零点场票房登顶
item.description:
Disney's animated blockbuster "Zootopia 2" premiered today in cinemas nationwide, simultaneously with North America. Its midnight screening box office exceeded 7.41 million yuan, topping yesterday's daily box office chart. As of now, the film's pre-sale box office has surpassed 268 million yuan, becoming the focus of this year's animation market. 迪士尼动画巨制《疯狂动物城 2》今天在全国影院同步北美上映，零点场票房突破 741 万元，登顶昨日单日票房榜。截至目前，影片预售票房已超过 2.68 亿元，成为今年动画市场的焦点。

The film's production team spent nine years, mobilized about 700 people, added 80 scenes, 76 animal species, and grand scenes with over 50,000 animals on screen, making it known as "Disney Animation's largest work in a hundred years." 影片制作团队历时九年，动员约 700 人，新增 80 个场景、76 种动物物种及超过 5 万只动物同框的宏大场面，该片被称为「迪士尼动画百年来规模最大的作品」。

item.title: 《投行风云》第 4 季定档 2026 年 1 月 11 日
item.description:
According to Deadline, the financial drama series "Industry" Season 4 will premiere on HBO on January 11, 2026, and will be simultaneously available on HBO Max. The series continues to occupy HBO's prime Sunday evening slot, with the new season comprising 8 episodes, airing one per week. 据 Deadline 报道，金融题材剧集《投行风云》第 4 季将于 2026 年 1 月 11 日在 HBO 首播，并同步上线 HBO Max。该剧继续占据 HBO 周日晚间的核心档期，新一季共 8 集，每周播出一集。

The official synopsis reveals that protagonists Harper (Myha’la) and Yasmin (Marisa Abela) face new challenges in London's financial circle. An emerging fintech company enters the market, drawing the two into a multinational game. 官方剧情简介显示，主角 Harper（Myha’la）与 Yasmin（Marisa Abela）在伦敦金融圈迎来新挑战。一家新兴金融科技公司进入市场，令两人卷入跨国博弈。

Yasmin's relationship with tech founder Henry Muck (Kit Harington) is complex, while Harper is drawn to the mysterious executive Whitney Halberstram (Max Minghella), and their friendship gradually twists under the pressure of money and power. Yasmin 与科技创始人 Henry Muck（Kit Harington）关系复杂，而 Harper 则被神秘高管 Whitney Halberstram（Max Minghella）吸引，两人之间的友情在金钱与权力压力下逐渐扭曲。

In addition to new faces, actors such as Ken Leung and Sagar Radia will continue to appear. Notably, Season 3 actor Harry Lawtey will not return. The production team is still led by Mickey Down and Konrad Kay, co-produced by Bad Wolf and BBC. 除新面孔外，Ken Leung、Sagar Radia 等演员将继续出演。值得注意的是，第 3 季演员 Harry Lawtey 不会回归。制作团队依旧由 Mickey Down 与 Konrad Kay 主导，Bad Wolf 与 BBC 联合出品。

item.title: 金 · 卡戴珊主演律政剧《万法公平》官宣续订第二季
item.guid: 金-·-卡戴珊主演律政剧《万法公平》官宣续订第二季
item.description:
According to Deadline, the legal drama "All's Fair," starring Kim Kardashian, has been confirmed for a second season. 据 Deadline 消息，金 · 卡戴珊主演的律政剧《万法公平》（All’s Fair）已确认续订第二季。

The series, created by Ryan Murphy, despite a Rotten Tomatoes score of only 3%, became Hulu's best-performing original scripted series premiere in three years thanks to strong viewership. News indicates that the second season is expected to begin filming next spring. 该剧由瑞恩 · 墨菲打造，尽管在烂番茄上的评分仅为 3%，但凭借强劲的收视表现成为 Hulu 三年来首播表现最好的原创有剧本剧集。消息显示，第二季预计将在明年春季开拍。

"All's Fair" Season 1 premiered on November 4, with global viewership reaching 3.2 million in its first three days. According to Luminate data, the series had 2.61 million hours of viewing in its first week in the US, entering the Top 15 list. In its second week, viewing hours rose to 3.85 million, ranking 13th, only behind series from Peacock, Netflix, and Apple. 《万法公平》第一季于 11 月 4 日开播，首三天全球观看量达到 320 万次。根据 Luminate 数据，该剧在美国首周观看时长为 261 万小时，进入 Top 15 榜单。第二周观看时长升至 385 万小时，排名第 13 位，仅次于 Peacock、Netflix 和苹果的剧集。

The series' plot focuses on a group of female lawyers who establish a law firm, handling high-stakes divorce cases and complex internal relationships. Season 1 will conclude with a two-episode finale on December 9. 该剧剧情聚焦一群女性律师创办律所，处理高风险离婚案件及内部复杂关系。第一季将于 12 月 9 日迎来两集大结局。
